name: BetterFileViewer
description: View PDF, office files and other files (stl, 3D models) directly in Discord without downloading.
author: Pharaoh2k, AGreenPig
features: Preview PDF files directly in Discord
View Microsoft Office files (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
Preview 3D models (STL, OBJ, 3MF, VSJ, VSB, VF)
Resizable embed windows for comfortable viewing
Toggle preview on/off with eye icon button
Large file warning for files over 10MB
Discord theme integration for seamless UI
